title: Easy Calculation
text:
Find x such that Ax+Bsin(x)=C.InputThe first line denotes T (number of test cases). 3T integers follow denoting A,B and C for every test case. (A >= B > 0). All Integers are less than 100000.OutputT real numbers rounded to 6 digits one in each line.ExampleInput:1
1 1 20Output:19.441787
